/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -shared -Wl,-soname,libEvent.so -o libEvent.so CMakeFiles/Event.dir/Event.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Event.dir/Pad.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Event_dict.dir/Event_dict.cxx.o  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/root/lib: /opt/root/lib/libNet.so.6.26.04 /opt/root/lib/libRIO.so.6.26.04 /opt/root/lib/libThread.so.6.26.04 /opt/root/lib/libCore.so.6.26.04
